package.name: GroupDocsSignature
package.summary: Save time by collecting signatures online, directly from your webpages.
package.description:
GroupDocs Signature is a web-based service that allows you to collect signatures online by embedding documents into web pages as digital forms. Once a document is embedded, it can be signed directly from a web-browser. This way you can collect signatures without the administrative overhead of printing, envelope stuffing and posting.
Here is how it works:
After installing the GroupDocs online signature extension, simply upload a document that you want to get signed. A wide range of office formats are supported: .pdf, .doc, .docx, .odt, .ppt, etc.
Then add form fields (such as date, initials and signature) to the document and embed it to your web page. This can be done automatically - you only need to enter the documents’ ID.
Your customer/partner can now sign the document directly on your website. The document can be signed through a web-browser, without the need to download it. As soon as the document is signed, you are notified.
